_header: It is first the floritif of fairness
_description: Three rhyming alliterative lines in an English prose homily

WorcF10.Transcription:
It is first þe floritif of fairnesIt is also infettif for
                    fellis& it is fir þer mor coruptif of clernes
WorcF10.Editions:
Brown,  Carleton Fairchild. 
             A Register of Middle English Religious & Didactic Verse.
         2 vols. London: Oxford University Press for the Bibliographical
            Society: 1916-20: 1.450.
